text: Mezhdu lyud'mi yest' takiye, kotoryye izbirayut dlya sebya, oprich Boga, mnimyye bozhestva: lyubyat ikh, kak dolzhno lyubit' Boga; no veruyushchiye krepki lyubov'yu k Bogu. A te nechestivtsy, kogda uznayut svoyu muku, uznayut, chto u Boga sila vo vsey polnote svoyey i chto Bog strog v nakazanii
